channel.title: YouTube on Tatsu Online
channel.description: Recent content in YouTube on Tatsu Online

item.title: Censorship in the Marketplace of Ideas
item.description: Introduction Over the last few years, the online video-sharing platform YouTube has been subject to a series of policy changes that have had a profound effect on the type of content and the types of ideas that are expressed or discussed by creators on the platform. Through examples and comparisons, I will attempt to argue that YouTube has fallen prey to the same circumstances that led to the censorship of printed media in the United States during the “golden era” of the early nineteenth century.
